availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
State of Illinois
Cook County
SS

I Robert Hervey of Chicago in the State of Illinois having been appointed by His Excellency the Governor of the State of Kentucky to take acknowledgements of deeds etc for said State of Kentucky within the State of Illiinois do hereby solemnly swear that I will well and truly Execute and perform all the duties of said station --

So help me God
Robt Hervey
A. T. G
June 4 1863
Subscribed and sworn to before me at Chicago aforesaid this 4th day of June A D 1863

figure.ab:
AZARIAH T. GALT
NOTARY
PUBLIC
CHICAGO, ILL.

body.p:
Illinois
Oath of Office of Robert Hervey of Chicago. Ills. as Commissioner for Kentucky in Illinois
Filed June 8. 1863.
